name: w3all/phpbbwordpressintegration
description: Common utilities for the integration between phpBB and WordPress. Can work as standalone. Update WordPress email, password and user_url to the same, when user's profile update occur into phpBB. Both on ACP and UCP. Add users into the linked WordPress using cURL when they register into phpBB. At same time, if no email confirmation required, after confirmation, if email confirmation required. Follow instructions and configure required values and redirect options into file /ext/w3all/phpbbwordpressintegration/custom/config.php (may) before to activate
